title: Hero MotoCorp launches Destini 125 XTEC; price starting at Rs 69,900
description: The new scooter, powered by a 125cc engine producing a power output of 9 BHP, comes in two variants with the standard variant priced Rs 69,900 and the top end tagged at Rs 79,990 (all prices ex-showroom, Delhi), the company said in a statement.
